Source: Middle of density range (0.6-3 tons / m^3) from wikipedia page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulk_carrier), which cited Lamb, Thomas (2003). Ship Design and Construction Vol. I. Jersey City: Society of Naval Architects and Marine Engineers. ISBN 0-939773-40-6. Can’t find specific number, so approximate 1 m^3 / DWT based on ratio of max volume to DWT for the other two bulk carriers.
